attributes.action: Government to pay self employed people for covid-19
attributes.additional_details: The government should pay the self employed people their full wage while they have to self isolate or their business self isolate based on their last tax return.
attributes.background: Most self employed people are the main provider for their family. If they have to self isolate then the household could suffer a loss of £2000 per month as a minimum. SSP is of no help to self employed people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301793

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
